dcterms:description: A multilingual speech translation corpus from English into 8 languages, comprising at least 385 hours of audio recordings from English TED Talks, aligned at the sentence level with their manual transcriptions and translations.

dcterms:language: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian
